She handles the complex part with remarkable ease.”{{Cite web|url=http://www.bollywoodhungama.com/movie/namastey-london/critic-review/|title=Namastey London Review - Bollywood Hungama|last=Hungama|first=Bollywood|website=Bollywood Hungama|language=en-US|access-date=2018-04-24}} [[File:Akshay & Katrina on the sets of Welcome.jpg|left|thumb|upright=1.1|alt=A man and a woman are looking away from the camera. The man is dressed in formal clothes, while the woman is wearing a light pink dress.|Kaif and [[Akshay Kumar]] on the set of ''[[Welcome (2007 film)|Welcome]]''; they teamed in several successful films.{{cite news |last=Tuteja |first=Joginder |title=I'll be there to guide any damsel in distress: Akshay |url=http://www.hindustantimes.com/news-feed/entertainment/i-ll-be-there-to-guide-any-damsel-in-distress-akshay/article1-479407.aspx |accessdate=4 December 2014 |work=Hindustan Times |date=23 November 2009 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20150205100659/http://www.hindustantimes.com/news-feed/entertainment/i-ll-be-there-to-guide-any-damsel-in-distress-akshay/article1-479407.aspx |archivedate=5 February 2015 |df= }}]] She had a supporting role as a doctor in the sports drama ''[[Apne]]''. The film was highly anticipated as it marked the first appearance of [[Dharmendra]] with his sons, [[Sunny Deol]] and [[Bobby Deol]].{{cite web|last=Gajjar |first=Manish |title=Apne |url=http://www.bbc.co.uk/shropshire/films/bollywood/2007/05/apne_preview.shtml |publisher=[[BBC]] |accessdate=8 October 2014 |date=15 April 2007 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20080226134026/http://www.bbc.co.uk/shropshire/films/bollywood/2007/05/apne_preview.shtml |archivedate=26 February 2008 |df= }} After ''Apne'' she rejoined director David Dhawan and Salman Khan for the comedy ''[[Partner (2007 film)|Partner]]'', a remake of ''[[Hitch (film)|Hitch]]'' which also starred [[Govinda]] and [[Lara Dutta]].{{cite news|last=Krishna|first=Sonali|title=Partner may face $30 mn Hitch|url=http://articles.economictimes.indiatimes.com/2007-08-08/news/27673674_1_hitch-indian-films-bollywood|accessdate=3 March 2014|work=[[The Economic Times]]|date=8 August 2007}} With a worldwide revenue of {{INRConvert|1.03|b}}, the film was a major financial success.{{cite web|url=http://www.boxofficeindia.com/showProd.php?itemCat=214&catName=MjAwNw== |title=Box Office 2007 |publisher=Box Office India |accessdate=22 September 2013 |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20131014132441/http://boxofficeindia.com/showProd.php?itemCat=214&catName=MjAwNw%3D%3D |archivedate=14 October 2013 |deadurl=yes |df= }}{{cite web|url=http://boxofficeindia.com/arounddetail.php?page=shownews&articleid=3997&nCat=|title=Top All Time Worldwide Grossers Updated 11/5/2012|publisher=Box Office India|accessdate=13 October 2013|date=11 May 2012|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20131105215110/http://www.boxofficeindia.com/arounddetail.php?page=shownews&articleid=4409&nCat=|archivedate=5 November 2013}} Kaif's final film of the year was [[Anees Bazmee]]'s comedy ''[[Welcome (2007 film)|Welcome]]'', alongside Akshay Kumar, [[Nana Patekar]], [[Mallika Sherawat]] and [[Anil Kapoor]]. Although the film generated mostly negative reviews, it proved to be the [[List of Bollywood films of 2007|second highest-grossing Bollywood film of 2007]]. The similarity of Kaif's roles was noted by [[Shoma Chaudhury]] of ''[[Tehelka]]'', who called her "unabashed eye-candy", adding that she was "a pretty prop in ''Welcome''" and "more of the same in ''Partner'' and ''Apne''". In 2008, the actress had three releases, the first of which was [[Abbas-Mustan]]'s action thriller ''[[Race (2008 film)|Race]]'', a story about two stepbrothers-turned-rivals who are in contention for their father's [[Insurance#Life|insurance money]]. Kaif played [[Saif Ali Khan]]'s secretary, who is his stepbrother's ([[Akshaye Khanna]]) lover. Nikhat Kazmi was appreciative of the film, praising its "super cool look [and] testosterone-high action sequences" but found Kaif "too pale" in her role.{{cite news|last=Kazmi |first=Nikhat |title=Race Review |url=http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/movie-reviews/hindi/Race/movie-review/2888134.cms |accessdate=22 September 2013 |work=The Times of India |date=21 March 2008 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20131010184938/http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/movie-reviews/hindi/Race/movie-review/2888134.cms |archivedate=10 October 2013 |df= }} After ''Race'', Kaif rejoined Akshay Kumar in Anees Bazmee's action comedy ''[[Singh Is Kinng]]''. The film earned {{INRConvert|1.25|b}} worldwide, making it Kaif's sixth consecutive box-office success.{{cite web|url=http://www.boxofficeindia.com/showProd.php?itemCat=215&catName=MjAwOA== |title=Box Office 2008 |publisher=Box Office India |accessdate=23 September 2013 |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20131014132123/http://boxofficeindia.com/showProd.php?itemCat=215&catName=MjAwOA%3D%3D |archivedate=14 October 2013 |deadurl=yes |df= }} However, she received mixed reviews for her performance. [[Rajeev Masand]] of [[CNN-IBN]] reviewed: "Katrina Kaif is an eyesore ... her acting so weak you want to urge her to watch everyone from [[Madhubala]] to [[Madhuri Dixit|Madhuri]] so she might pick up a few tricks".{{cite web|last=Masand |first=Rajeev |title=Masand's Verdict: Singh is Kinng |url=http://ibnlive.in.com/news/singh-is-kinng-a-dead-zone-of-comedy/70704-8.html |publisher=CNN-IBN |accessdate=22 September 2013 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20130922190131/http://ibnlive.in.com/news/singh-is-kinng-a-dead-zone-of-comedy/70704-8.html |archivedate=22 September 2013 |df= }} Kaif's final film of the year—[[Subhash Ghai]]'s drama ''[[Yuvvraaj]]''—was a major box-office failure. In preparation for her role as a cellist she practised her playing with orchestra members.{{cite news|last=KBR|first=Upala|title=KAIFi tagda hai|url=http://archive.mid-day.com/entertainment/2008/nov/131108-Salman-Khan-Katrina-Kaif-Pranksters-Cello-Yuvvraaj-Bollywood.htm|accessdate=23 October 2013|work=[[Mid Day]]|date=13 November 2008}} Her portrayal of a girl forbidden by her father from marrying her poor lover was well received by Sify's Sonia Chopra: "Katrina is wonderful, plays the cello convincingly, and looks ethereal".{{cite web|last=Chopra |first=Sonia |title=Review: Yuvvraaj a yawn of a moral science lesson |url=http://www.sify.com/movies/review-yuvvraaj-a-yawn-of-a-moral-science-lesson-review-bollywood-14803151.html |publisher=[[Sify]] |accessdate=22 October 2013 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20131222174804/http://www.sify.com/movies/review-yuvvraaj-a-yawn-of-a-moral-science-lesson-review-bollywood-14803151.html |archivedate=22 December 2013 |df= }} Despite the film's mixed critical reception, its screenplay was added to the library of the [[Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences]] for its artistic merit.{{cite news|last=Memon |first=Ayaz |title=When lines are crossed |url=http://www.dnaindia.com/analysis/column-when-lines-are-crossed-1208634 |accessdate=19 July 2014 |work=[[Daily News and Analysis]] |date=22 November 2008 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140727164342/http://www.dnaindia.com/analysis/column-when-lines-are-crossed-1208634 |archivedate=27 July 2014 |df= }}{{cite news |title=Subhash Ghai's Yuvvraaj goes to Oscar library |url=http://www.hindustantimes.com/News-Feed/Entertainment/Subhash-Ghai-s-Yuvvraaj-goes-to-Oscar-library/Article1-377914.aspx |accessdate=22 September 2013 |work=Hindustan Times |date=12 February 2009 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20130929235306/http://www.hindustantimes.com/News-Feed/Entertainment/Subhash-Ghai-s-Yuvvraaj-goes-to-Oscar-library/Article1-377914.aspx |archivedate=29 September 2013 |df= }} Before ''[[New York (film)|New York]]'', Kaif's voice was [[Dubbing (filmmaking)|dubbed over]] by voice artists in most of her films due to her lack of fluency in Hindi and other Indian languages.{{efn|name=B|In ''Boom'', ''Namastey London'' and ''Singh is Kingg'', Kaif's real voice was retained.{{cite news |title=Stars with voiceovers |url=http://www.hindustantimes.com/entertainment/bollywood/stars-with-voiceovers/article1-908137.aspx |accessdate=16 October 2014 |work=Hindustan Times |date=4 August 2012 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20141021185115/http://www.hindustantimes.com/entertainment/bollywood/stars-with-voiceovers/article1-908137.aspx |archivedate=21 October 2014 |df= }}{{cite news|title=Katrina finds her voice |url=http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news/Katrina-finds-her-voice/articleshow/2212297.cms |accessdate=16 October 2014 |work=The Times of India |date=20 October 2006 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20141025175924/http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news/Katrina-finds-her-voice/articleshow/2212297.cms |archivedate=25 October 2014 |df= }}}} Although she appeared in a series of successful films, critics noted that she had little to do in them as they were generally [[Androcentrism|male-dominated]].{{cite news|last=Vijayakar |first=Rajiv |title=New queen bee? |url=http://www.deccanherald.com/content/274159/queen-bee.html |accessdate=19 July 2014 |work=[[Deccan Chronicle]] |date=26 August 2014 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140726082502/http://www.deccanherald.com/content/274159/queen-bee.html |archivedate=26 July 2014 |df= }} Her performances were also largely criticised.{{cite news|last=Kaul |first=Vivek |title=Deepika is the new Katrina |url=http://www.dnaindia.com/blogs/post-deepika-is-the-new-katrina-1581434 |accessdate=22 September 2013 |work=Daily News and Analysis |date=31 July 2009 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20141012222006/http://www.dnaindia.com/blogs/post-deepika-is-the-new-katrina-1581434 |archivedate=12 October 2014 |df= }}{{cite web|title=I look at acting more as motivation than inspiration: Katrina |url=http://zeenews.india.com/exclusive/i-look-at-acting-more-as-motivation-than-inspiration-katrina_4092.html |publisher=Zee News |accessdate=11 October 2013 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20131014040601/http://zeenews.india.com/exclusive/i-look-at-acting-more-as-motivation-than-inspiration-katrina_4092.html |archivedate=14 October 2013 |df= }} About her series of glamorous roles, Kaif said that her "first few films were really a process of learning ... There was no target". ===''New York'' and commercial successes (2009–2014)=== After a string of films in which she was cast to add glamour, Kaif appeared in [[Kabir Khan (director)|Kabir Khan]]'s terrorism drama ''New York'' (2009).{{cite news|last=Harshikaa |first=Udasi |title=Kat’s crown |url=http://www.hindu.com/fr/2009/07/03/stories/2009070350010100.htm |accessdate=23 September 2013 |work=The Hindu |date=3 July 2009 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20130928042938/http://www.hindu.com/fr/2009/07/03/stories/2009070350010100.htm |archivedate=28 September 2013 |df= }} Featuring [[John Abraham (actor)|John Abraham]] and [[Neil Nitin Mukesh]] in lead roles, the film tells the story of how three friends' lives are changed when the former is [[Post-9/11#Suspicion|wrongly detained]] after [[September 11 attacks|9/11]]. Kaif played Maya, a college student who later marries a terrorist. The actress said that she identified with Maya, since she experienced similar isolation because of her skin colour when she was growing up in London.{{cite news|title=I was conscious of my skin colour while growing up: Katrina |url=http://archive.indianexpress.com/news/i-was-conscious-of-my-skin-colour-while-growing-up-katrina/480776/ |accessdate=23 September 2013 |work=The Indian Express |date=24 June 2009 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140222152209/http://archive.indianexpress.com/news/i-was-conscious-of-my-skin-colour-while-growing-up-katrina/480776/ |archivedate=22 February 2014 |df= }} Kaif also remarked that she was tired of "arm candy" roles and was looking for more substantial parts.{{cite news|title=Kat is only Akshay's arm candy|url=http://articles.timesofindia.indiatimes.com/2009-08-07/news-interviews/28190362_1_akshay-kumar-katrina-kaif-s-homepage-film|accessdate=23 September 2013|work=The Times of India|date=7 August 2009}} ''New York'' did well at the box office and received favourable reviews.{{cite web|url=http://www.boxofficeindia.com/showProd.php?itemCat=288&catName=MjAwOQ== |title=Box Office 2009 |publisher=Box Office India |accessdate=11 October 2013 |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20131014131907/http://boxofficeindia.com/showProd.php?itemCat=288&catName=MjAwOQ%3D%3D |archivedate=14 October 2013 |deadurl=yes |df= }}{{cite news |title=I am not glamorous in real life: Katrina Kaif |url=http://www.hindustantimes.com/News-Feed/Entertainment/I-am-not-glamorous-in-real-life-Katrina-Kaif/Article1-472226.aspx |accessdate=25 June 2014 |work=Hindustan Times |date=3 November 2009 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140714122213/http://www.hindustantimes.com/News-Feed/Entertainment/I-am-not-glamorous-in-real-life-Katrina-Kaif/Article1-472226.aspx |archivedate=14 July 2014 |df= }} According to [[Subhash K. Jha]], Kaif "comes into her own as an actress of substance ... From the carefree effervescent campus girl to the anguished wife, Katrina makes the journey look plausible all the way".{{cite news|last=Jha |first=Subhash K. |title='New York', a remarkable effort |url=http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/bollywood/news-interviews/New-York-a-remarkable-effort/articleshow/4709214.cms?referral=PM |accessdate=23 September 2013 |work=The Times of India |date=27 June 2009 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20160215052638/http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/bollywood/news-interviews/New-York-a-remarkable-effort/articleshow/4709214.cms?referral=PM |archivedate=15 February 2016 |df= }} A reviewer for ''The Times of India'' considered it to be the "best performance of her entire career.”{{cite news|title=New York Movie Review|url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/movie-reviews/new-york/movie-review/4707568.cms|work=The Times of India|date=26 June 2009|accessdate=25 April 2018}} ''New York'' brought Kaif her first [[Filmfare Award for Best Actress#2010s|Filmfare Award nomination for Best Actress]].{{cite web|url=http://www.bollywoodhungama.com/celebritymicro/awards/id/3458 |title=Katrina Kaif | Latest Celebrity Awards |accessdate=12 November 2014 |publisher=Bollywood Hungama |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20141112101550/http://www.bollywoodhungama.com/celebritymicro/awards/id/3458 |archivedate=12 November 2014 |df= }} She then appeared in a cameo for India's first underwater thriller ''[[Blue (2009 film)|Blue]]''.{{cite news|last=Jha|first=Subhash K.|title=Katrina's guest performance in Blue lasts just 8 minutes|url=http://archive.mid-day.com/entertainment/2009/aug/190809-Bollywood-Katrina-Kaif-Blue-underwater-thriller-guest-performance.htm|accessdate=23 September 2013|work=Mid Day|date=19 August 2009}} Kaif starred with [[Ranbir Kapoor]] in [[Rajkumar Santoshi]]'s hit comedy, ''[[Ajab Prem Ki Ghazab Kahani]]'' (2009), as an orphan forced to marry a rich man.{{cite web|url=http://www.boxofficeindia.com/showProd.php?itemCat=288&catName=MjAwOQ== |title=Box Office 2009 |publisher=Box Office India |accessdate=28 January 2014 |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20131014131907/http://boxofficeindia.com/showProd.php?itemCat=288&catName=MjAwOQ%3D%3D |archivedate=14 October 2013 |deadurl=yes |df= }} [[Taran Adarsh]] of [[Bollywood Hungama]] wrote, "Katrina Kaif continues to surprise ... She scores in both emotional and light scenes" and called her chemistry with Kapoor "electrifying".{{cite web|last=Adarsh |first=Taran |title=Ajab Prem Ki Ghazab Kahani (2009) Review |url=http://www.bollywoodhungama.com/moviemicro/criticreview/id/510223 |publisher=[[Bollywood Hungama]] |accessdate=23 September 2013 |date=6 November 2013 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20131015042425/http://www.bollywoodhungama.com/moviemicro/criticreview/id/510223 |archivedate=15 October 2013 |df= }} Her final film of the year was [[Priyadarshan]]'s comedy ''[[De Dana Dan]]''. [[File:Katrina Kaif.jpg|thumb|upright=0.9|left|alt=A woman dressed in a white salwar kameez (traditional Indian dress) with her hair down is smiling and looking away from the camera.|Kaif at a promotional event for ''[[Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara]]'', 2011]] In 2010, Kaif appeared in [[Prakash Jha]]'s political thriller ''[[Raajneeti]]'' as part of an ensemble cast which included Ranbir Kapoor, [[Ajay Devgan]], [[Arjun Rampal]], Nana Patekar, [[Manoj Bajpai]] and [[Sarah Thompson (actress)|Sarah Thompson]]. The film took inspiration from ''[[Mahabharata|The Mahabharata]]'' and [[Mario Puzo]]'s 1969 novel ''[[The Godfather (novel)|The Godfather]]''.{{cite news|last=Lahiri |first=Tripti |url=https://blogs.wsj.com/indiarealtime/2010/06/04/rajneeti-mahabharat-godfather-set-in-bhopal/ |title=‘Rajneeti’: ‘Mahabharat,’ ‘Godfather,’ in Bhopal |work=[[The Wall Street Journal]] |date=4 June 2010 |accessdate=11 October 2013 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20131015075752/https://blogs.wsj.com/indiarealtime/2010/06/04/rajneeti-mahabharat-godfather-set-in-bhopal/ |archivedate=15 October 2013 |df= }} Set in [[Bhopal]], the film described a fiercely fought election campaign by two parties attempting to seize power with manipulation, corruption and treachery. Although there was media speculation before the film's release that Kaif's character was based on [[Sonia Gandhi]], the actress denied this. In preparation for her role as Indu (a politician loosely based on [[Draupadi]]), she watched [[Priyanka Gandhi]]'s election campaign videos to study the body language and interaction of politicians.{{cite web|title='I was shocked when approached for Raajneeti' |url=http://ibnlive.in.com/news/i-was-shocked-when-approached-for-raajneeti/115962-8-66.html |publisher=CNN-IBN |accessdate=20 April 2014 |date=22 May 2010 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140421083323/http://ibnlive.in.com/news/i-was-shocked-when-approached-for-raajneeti/115962-8-66.html |archivedate=21 April 2014 |df= }}{{cite news|title=I watched Priyanka Gandhi's videos to get Rajneeti look: Katrina |url=http://indiatoday.intoday.in/story/I+watched+Priyanka+Gandhi's+videos+to+get+Rajneeti+look:+Katrina/1/94724.html |accessdate=23 September 2013 |work=India Today |date=26 April 2010 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140427030623/http://indiatoday.intoday.in/story/I%20watched%20Priyanka%20Gandhi%27s%20videos%20to%20get%20Rajneeti%20look%3A%20Katrina/1/94724.html |archivedate=27 April 2014 |df= }} The film received mainly positive reviews from critics.{{cite news |last=Bhirani |first=Radhika |title=Raajneeti has coffers ringing with political winner |url=http://www.hindustantimes.com/News-Feed/Entertainment/Raajneeti-has-coffers-ringing-with-political-winner/Article1-555238.aspx |accessdate=22 October 2013 |work=Hindustan Times |date=9 June 2010 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20131025174724/http://www.hindustantimes.com/News-Feed/Entertainment/Raajneeti-has-coffers-ringing-with-political-winner/Article1-555238.aspx |archivedate=25 October 2013 |df= }} Rajeev Masand found ''Raajneeti'' "thrilling and gripping", though Namrata Joshi was more critical and expressed her disappointment over the film's depiction of women.{{cite web|last=Masand |first=Rajeev |title='Raajneeti' is thrilling and gripping |url=http://ibnlive.in.com/news/masand-raajneeti-is-thrilling-and-gripping/121986-8-84.html |publisher=CNN-IBN |accessdate=13 January 2014 |date=5 June 2010 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140113231757/http://ibnlive.in.com/news/masand-raajneeti-is-thrilling-and-gripping/121986-8-84.html |archivedate=13 January 2014 |df= }}{{cite news|last=Joshi |first=Namrata |title=Rajneeti |url=http://www.outlookindia.com/article/Rajneeti/265711 |accessdate=24 September 2013 |work=[[Outlook (magazine)|Outlook]] |date=4 June 2010 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140714144900/http://www.outlookindia.com/article/Rajneeti/265711 |archivedate=14 July 2014 |df= }} Nikhat Kazmi considered Kaif's performance to be "carefree and camera-unconscious" and wrote that she "seems to slip into the high-powered shoes easily".{{cite news|last=Kazmi |first=Nikhat |title=Raajneeti Review |url=http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/movie-reviews/hindi/Raajneeti/movie-review/6007822.cms |accessdate=23 September 2013 |work=The Times of India |date=3 June 2013 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20120820214326/http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/movie-reviews/hindi/Raajneeti/movie-review/6007822.cms |archivedate=20 August 2012 |df= }} The film was highly successful at the box office, receiving a total collection of {{INRConvert|1.4|b}}.{{cite web|url=http://www.boxofficeindia.com/showProd.php?itemCat=318&catName=MjAxMA== |title=Box Office 2010 |publisher=Box Office India |accessdate=23 September 2013 |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20131014062657/http://www.boxofficeindia.com/showProd.php?itemCat=318&catName=MjAxMA%3D%3D |archivedate=14 October 2013 |deadurl=yes |df= }} Kaif collaborated with Akshay Kumar for the sixth time in the [[slapstick]] comedy ''[[Tees Maar Khan (2010 film)|Tees Maar Khan]]'' (2010).{{cite web|title=Akshay Kumar wants Katrina as his lady |url=http://www.emirates247.com/entertainment/akshay-kumar-wants-katrina-as-his-lady-2012-04-02-1.451645 |publisher=[[Emirates 24/7]] |date=2 April 2012 |accessdate=10 December 2014 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20141214182711/http://www.emirates247.com/entertainment/akshay-kumar-wants-katrina-as-his-lady-2012-04-02-1.451645 |archivedate=14 December 2014 |df= }} For her role as an aspiring actress, Kaif appeared in a popular [[item number]] titled "[[Sheila Ki Jawani]]". The song was choreographed by the film's director [[Farah Khan]] and for the belly dancing portion of the song, Kaif was trained by expert Veronica D'Souza.{{cite news|last=Dabholkar|first=Reshma K.|title=Katrina: Bollywood's only belly dancer|url=http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news/Katrina-Bollywoods-only-belly-dancer/pmredirectshow/7058136.cms?|accessdate=19 May 2015|work=The Times of India|date=7 December 2010}} "Sheila Ki Jawani" was often compared to another item number released the same year "[[Munni Badnaam Hui]]" from ''[[Dabangg]]''.{{cite news|last=Wangoo|first=Anupama|title=Sheila steals Munni's thunder|url=http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/chandigarh/Sheila-steals-Munnis-thunder/articleshow/7164852.cms?referral=PM|accessdate=21 May 2015|work=The Times of India|date=26 December 2010}} Despite the song's popularity, ''Tees Maar Khan'' was panned by critics and underperformed at the box office.{{cite news |title=TMK fails to impress critics |url=http://www.hindustantimes.com/Entertainment/Bollywood/TMK-fails-to-impress-critics/Article1-642276.aspx |accessdate=22 October 2013 |work=Hindustan Times |date=24 December 2010 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20131025174721/http://www.hindustantimes.com/Entertainment/Bollywood/TMK-fails-to-impress-critics/Article1-642276.aspx |archivedate=25 October 2013 |df= }}{{cite news|title=Fall and fall of akki |url=http://www.telegraphindia.com/1110209/jsp/entertainment/story_13553921.jsp |accessdate=10 December 2014 |work=[[The Telegraph (Calcutta)|The Telegraph]] |date=9 February 2011 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20141210050313/http://www.telegraphindia.com/1110209/jsp/entertainment/story_13553921.jsp |archivedate=10 December 2014 |df= }} Kaif's portrayal was not well received; Renuka Rao of ''[[Daily News and Analysis]]'' said that her "drama queen act is performed ... poorly", but noted that she "does full justice" to the item number.{{cite news|last=Rao |first=Renuka |title=Review: Tees Maar Khan is not worth even a free ticket |url=http://www.dnaindia.com/entertainment/review-review-tees-maar-khan-is-not-worth-even-a-free-ticket-1485367 |accessdate=23 September 2013 |work=Daily News and Analysis |date=3 December 2010 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20141012223534/http://www.dnaindia.com/entertainment/review-review-tees-maar-khan-is-not-worth-even-a-free-ticket-1485367 |archivedate=12 October 2014 |df= }} The following year, Kaif was paired with [[Hrithik Roshan]] in [[Zoya Akhtar]]'s coming-of-age dramedy ''[[Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara]]''.{{cite news|last=Lalwani|first=Vickey|title=No issues with the kiss: Hrithik Roshan, Katrina Kaif|url=http://articles.timesofindia.indiatimes.com/2011-06-24/news-interviews/29698522_1_katrina-kaif-kiss-locking-lips|accessdate=24 September 2013|work=The Times of India|date=24 June 2011}} The film narrates the story of three friends on a bachelor trip, and how the [[workaholic|workaholism]] of one was overcome with the help of Laila (Kaif). The film was a critical and commercial success.{{cite news|last=Sahni |first=Diksha |url=https://blogs.wsj.com/indiarealtime/2011/07/15/review-round-up-zindagi-na-milegi-dobara/ |title=Review Round-Up: ‘Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara’ |work=The Wall Street Journal |date=15 July 2011 |accessdate=26 June 2014 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140714233533/https://blogs.wsj.com/indiarealtime/2011/07/15/review-round-up-zindagi-na-milegi-dobara/ |archivedate=14 July 2014 |df= }}{{cite web|url=http://www.boxofficeindia.com/cpages.php?pageName=earnings|title=Box Office Earnings 19/08/10 – 25/08/11 (Nett Collections in Ind Rs)|publisher=Box Office India|accessdate=10 December 2014|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20110903171326/http://www.boxofficeindia.com/cpages.php?pageName=earnings|archivedate=3 September 2011}} Richard Kuipers of ''[[Variety (magazine)|Variety]]'' commented that she is "delightful as the sweet-natured girl who inspires everyone to look in the mirror and do something about it".{{cite news|last=Kuipers |first=Richard |title=Review: ‘Zindagi na milegi dobara’ |url=https://variety.com/2011/film/reviews/zindagi-na-milegi-dobara-1117945686/ |accessdate=23 September 2013 |work=[[Variety (magazine)|Variety]] |date=21 July 2011 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20130928223219/http://variety.com/2011/film/reviews/zindagi-na-milegi-dobara-1117945686/ |archivedate=28 September 2013 |df= }} ''Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara'' was one of the most awarded films of the year and received numerous Best Film accolades.{{cite web|url=http://www.bollywoodhungama.com/moviemicro/awards/id/535587|title=Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara (2011) | Latest Movie Awards|accessdate=28 January 2014|publisher=Bollywood Hungama|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20131103035713/http://www.bollywoodhungama.com/moviemicro/awards/id/535587|archivedate=3 November 2013}} Kaif then featured in [[Yash Raj Films]]' romantic comedy ''[[Mere Brother Ki Dulhan]]'' (2011) with [[Imran Khan (Bollywood actor)|Imran Khan]] and [[Ali Zafar]],{{cite news|last=Guharoy|first=Rounak|title=Imran Khan, Katrina Kaif set the stage on fire|url=http://articles.timesofindia.indiatimes.com/2011-08-11/news-interviews/29875873_1_ali-zafar-mere-brother-ki-dulhan-katrina-kaif|accessdate=23 September 2013|work=The Times of India|date=11 August 2011}} She was cast as Dimple Dixit, a "talkative", "unpredictable" girl, a role she described as challenging as the character's personality contrasted with her own.{{cite news|last=Jha|first=Subhash K.|title=Katrina gets headstrong!|url=http://articles.timesofindia.indiatimes.com/2010-11-04/news-interviews/28271258_1_ali-abbas-zafar-katrina-kaif-girl-after-much-preparation|accessdate=24 September 2013|work=The Times of India|date=4 November 2010}} While the film earned mixed reviews, Kaif was generally praised for her portrayal.{{cite news|last=Garia |first=Nikita |url=https://blogs.wsj.com/indiarealtime/2011/09/10/review-round-up-mere-brother-ki-dulhan/ |title=Review Round-Up: ‘Mere Brother Ki Dulhan’ |work=The Wall Street Journal |date=10 September 2011 |accessdate=26 October 2013 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20131029201255/https://blogs.wsj.com/indiarealtime/2011/09/10/review-round-up-mere-brother-ki-dulhan/ |archivedate=29 October 2013 |df= }} The book ''Mother Maiden Mistress'' called Dimple one of the more interesting female characters of the year and Gaurav Malani of ''[[The Economic Times]]'' said the film was watchable because of "Katrina's live-wire energy wherein she never goes overboard and keeps bustling with vivacity through the runtime".{{cite book|last1=Somaaya|first1=Bhawana|last2=Kothari|first2=Jigna|last3=Madangarli|first3=Supriya|title=Mother Maiden Mistress: Women in Hindi Cinema, 1950–2010|date=9 January 2013|publisher=HarperCollins India|isbn=978-81-7223-859-9|url=https://books.google.com/books?id=Dtec0Ykfo1sC&pg=RA5-PA2011|page=2011}}{{cite news|last=Malani|first=Gaurav|title=Mere Brother Ki Dulhan: Movie review|url=http://articles.economictimes.indiatimes.com/2011-09-09/news/30135706_1_mere-brother-ki-dulhan-katrina-kaif-imran-khan|accessdate=23 September 2013|work=The Economic Times|date=9 September 2011}} For this performance, Kaif received her second Filmfare nomination in the Best Actress category. In 2012, Kaif appeared in "[[Chikni Chameli]]", an item number in ''[[Agneepath (2012 film)|Agneepath]]'' that incorporated dance steps from the [[Lavani]] genre (a [[Maharashtra|Maharashtrian]] folk dance). The song was filmed over a ten-day period{{cite news|last=Raje|first=Abhishek|title=Chikni Chameli gets 3.8 million views within a week!|url=http://articles.timesofindia.indiatimes.com/2011-12-28/news-interviews/30562001_1_chikni-chameli-agneepath-katrina-kaif|accessdate=12 October 2013|work=The Times of India|date=28 December 2011}} and, according to the actress, "It was hard work. It was very fast and it was not a style I was used to, but I took it as a challenge".{{cite news |title=Chikni Chameli not my style: Katrina Kaif |url=http://www.hindustantimes.com/Entertainment/Bollywood/Chikni-Chameli-not-my-style-Katrina-Kaif/Article1-787297.aspx |accessdate=12 October 2013 |work=Hindustan Times |date=26 December 2011 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20131021230355/http://www.hindustantimes.com/Entertainment/Bollywood/Chikni-Chameli-not-my-style-Katrina-Kaif/Article1-787297.aspx |archivedate=21 October 2013 |df= }} Kaif appeared next in Kabir Khan's espionage thriller ''[[Ek Tha Tiger]]'' as a Pakistani [[Inter-Services Intelligence|ISI]] agent who falls in love with an Indian [[Research and Analysis Wing|RAW]] agent. Shubhra Gupta of ''The Indian Express'' wrote about her performance: "Katrina is an able, animated foil to Salman, her long legs making her leaps and kicks credible".{{cite news|last=Gupta|first=Shubhra|title=Ek Tha Tiger|url=http://archive.indianexpress.com/news/ek-tha-tiger/989475/0|accessdate=24 September 2013|work=The Indian Express|date=17 August 2012}} The film received predominantly positive reviews, with Aniruddha Guha of ''Daily News and Analysis'' calling it "smart and stylish".{{cite news |title=Critics Report: Ek Tha Tiger burning bright |url=http://www.hindustantimes.com/Entertainment/Bollywood/Critics-Report-Ek-Tha-Tiger-burning-bright/Article1-914019.aspx |accessdate=22 October 2013 |work=Hindustan Times |date=15 August 2012 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20131025174658/http://www.hindustantimes.com/Entertainment/Bollywood/Critics-Report-Ek-Tha-Tiger-burning-bright/Article1-914019.aspx |archivedate=25 October 2013 |df= }}{{cite news|last=Guha |first=Aniruddha |title=Aniruddha Guha reviews Ek Tha Tiger |url=http://www.dnaindia.com/entertainment/review-aniruddha-guha-reviews-ek-tha-tiger-method-in-the-salman-madness-1728293 |accessdate= |work=Daily News and Analysis |date=15 August 2012 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20141012224312/http://www.dnaindia.com/entertainment/review-aniruddha-guha-reviews-ek-tha-tiger-method-in-the-salman-madness-1728293 |archivedate=12 October 2014 |df= }} With worldwide earnings of {{INRConvert|3.1|b}}, ''Ek Tha Tiger'' was the [[List of Bollywood films of 2012|highest-grossing Bollywood film of the year]].{{cite web|url=http://www.boxofficeindia.com/boxnewsdetail.php?page=shownews&articleid=5979&nCat=|title=Chennai Express Crosses Ek Tha Tiger Worldwide In Ten Days|publisher=Box Office India|accessdate=21 September 2013|date=19 August 2013|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20131105220137/http://boxofficeindia.com/boxnewsdetail.php?page=shownews&articleid=5979&nCat=|archivedate=5 November 2013}}{{cite news|url=http://www.ibtimes.co.in/articles/415845/20121217/top-10-grossers-2012.htm |title=Top 10 Bollywood Box Office Grossers of 2012; "Ek Tha Tiger" Tops List |date=17 December 2012 |work=[[International Business Times]] |accessdate=14 January 2014 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140114080943/http://www.ibtimes.co.in/articles/415845/20121217/top-10-grossers-2012.htm |archivedate=14 January 2014 |df= }} [[File:Anushka Sharma, Shahrukh Khan and Katrina Kaif at the premiere of JAB TAK HAI JAAN.jpg|thumb|alt=A man in a suit is interlocking arms with two women. The woman on the left is wearing a blue one-shouldered gown with her hair up, while the woman on the right is wearing a gold sari (South Asian attire) with her hair down.|Kaif (right) with [[Anushka Sharma]] and [[Shah Rukh Khan]] at the premiere of ''[[Jab Tak Hai Jaan]]'', 2012|302x302px]] That year Kaif also appeared with [[Shah Rukh Khan]] and [[Anushka Sharma]] in [[Yash Chopra]]'s [[Swan song#Idiom|swan song]], the romance ''[[Jab Tak Hai Jaan]]''.{{cite web|last=Roy|first=Gitanjali|title=Big bang at the box office today: Jab Tak Hai Jaan, Son Of Sardaar|url=http://movies.ndtv.com/bollywood/big-bang-at-the-box-office-today-jab-tak-hai-jaan-son-of-sardaar-291901|publisher=NDTV|accessdate=28 March 2014|date=13 November 2012|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140527015235/http://movies.ndtv.com/bollywood/big-bang-at-the-box-office-today-jab-tak-hai-jaan-son-of-sardaar-291901|archivedate=27 May 2014}} About working with Chopra, she remarked that he "undoubtedly is the king of romance and I have always admired the way he presents his heroines. It was always a dream to work with him and the reality is even better".{{cite news|title=Reality better than dreams: Katrina Kaif|url=http://archive.mid-day.com/entertainment/2012/apr/270412-Reality-better-than-dreams-Katrina-Kaif.htm|accessdate=24 September 2013|work=Mid Day|date=27 April 2012}} She played Meera, a woman who promises God to end her affair with her comatose lover if he survives. Although the film received mostly positive reviews, Kaif's performance had a mixed reception.{{cite news|last=Rana |first=Preetika |url=https://blogs.wsj.com/indiarealtime/2012/11/13/review-round-up-jab-tak-hai-jaan-woos-critics/ |title=Review Round Up: ‘Jab Tak Hai Jaan’ Woos Critics |work=The Wall Street Journal |date=13 November 2012 |accessdate=26 October 2013 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20131029212135/https://blogs.wsj.com/indiarealtime/2012/11/13/review-round-up-jab-tak-hai-jaan-woos-critics/ |archivedate=29 October 2013 |df= }} CNN-IBN wrote: "Meera's role was a difficult one and Katrina falls short in emotional scenes. It seems Katrina still doesn't feel very easy in front of the camera and has difficulty with complex expressions".{{cite web|last=Vats |first=Rohit |title=Jab Tak Hai Jaan: How has Katrina Kaif fared in the film? |url=http://ibnlive.in.com/news/jab-tak-hai-jaan-how-has-katrina-kaif-fared-in-the-film/305984-8.html |publisher=CNN-IBN |accessdate=24 September 2013 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20131009015036/http://ibnlive.in.com/news/jab-tak-hai-jaan-how-has-katrina-kaif-fared-in-the-film/305984-8.html |archivedate= 9 October 2013 |df= }} Commercially, the film proved a box-office hit with revenues of {{INRConvert|2.11|b}} worldwide.{{cite news|last=Mehta |first=Ankita |title='Jab Tak Hai Jaan' Box Office Collection: Shahrukh Starrer is a Blockbuster Overseas |url=http://www.ibtimes.co.in/articles/411072/20121204/jab-tak-hai-jaan-box-office-collection.htm |work=International Business Times |accessdate=24 September 2013 |date=4 December 2012 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20130927081651/http://www.ibtimes.co.in/articles/411072/20121204/jab-tak-hai-jaan-box-office-collection.htm |archivedate=27 September 2013 |df= }} In 2013, she appeared briefly with [[Aamir Khan]] in [[Vijay Krishna Acharya]]'s action thriller ''[[Dhoom 3]]''.{{cite news|title=Aamir, Abhishek, Katrina and Uday promote 'Dhoom 3' |url=http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news-interviews/Aamir-Abhishek-Katrina-and-Uday-promote-Dhoom-3/articleshow/27215896.cms |accessdate=10 July 2014 |work=The Times of India |date=11 December 2013 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20160215052736/http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news-interviews/Aamir-Abhishek-Katrina-and-Uday-promote-Dhoom-3/articleshow/27215896.cms |archivedate=15 February 2016 |df= }} To prepare for her role as a circus performer, she undertook a year-long regimen of [[Pilates]], [[functional training]] and [[aerial straps]].{{cite news|title=Katrina Kaif gets perfect body for Dhoom 3|url=http://articles.timesofindia.indiatimes.com/2013-11-21/news-interviews/44325481_1_dhoom-3-katrina-kaif-perfect-body|accessdate=13 January 2014|work=The Times of India|date=21 November 2013}} The film received ambivalent reviews and Kaif was criticised for taking on an insubstantial part.{{cite news |title=Movie review: Dhoom 3 a splendid watch but lacks imagination |url=http://www.hindustantimes.com/entertainment/reviews/movie-review-dhoom-3-a-splendid-watch-but-lacks-imagination/article1-1164671.aspx |accessdate=13 January 2014 |work=Hindustan Times |date=20 December 2013 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140112223634/http://www.hindustantimes.com/entertainment/reviews/movie-review-dhoom-3-a-splendid-watch-but-lacks-imagination/article1-1164671.aspx |archivedate=12 January 2014 |df= }} Earning {{INRConvert|5.42|b}} in box-office receipts, ''Dhoom 3'' went on to become the [[List of highest-grossing Bollywood films|highest-grossing Bollywood film of all time]] until it was surpassed by ''[[PK (film)|PK]]'' in 2014.{{cite news|last=Upadhyaya |first=Prakash |title='PK'(Peekay) Box Office Collection: Aamir Khan Starrer's Next Target – ₹600 Crores |url=http://www.ibtimes.co.in/pk-peekay-box-office-collection-aamir-khan-starrers-next-target-600-crores-619194 |publisher=International Business Times |accessdate=4 January 2015 |date=4 January 2015 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20150104162528/http://www.ibtimes.co.in/pk-peekay-box-office-collection-aamir-khan-starrers-next-target-600-crores-619194 |archivedate= 4 January 2015 |df= }} Kaif's next appearance was in [[Siddharth Anand]]'s ''[[Bang Bang!]]'' (2014), a remake of the 2010 action comedy ''[[Knight and Day]]''.{{cite news|last=Lalwani |first=Vickey |title=Hrithik prepping up for Knight and Day remake |url=http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news/Hrithik-prepping-up-for-Knight-and-Day-remake/articleshow/18441696.cms |accessdate=26 September 2013 |work=The Times of India |date=11 February 2013 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140905031120/http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news/Hrithik-prepping-up-for-Knight-and-Day-remake/articleshow/18441696.cms |archivedate= 5 September 2014 |df= }} She played a bank receptionist who unwittingly gets caught up with a secret agent (Hrithik Roshan). [[Raja Sen]] of Rediff.com was disappointed with her performance, describing it as "insufferable".{{cite web|last=Sen |first=Raja |title=Review: Bang Bang is loud, dumb, exhausting |url=http://www.rediff.com/movies/review/review-bang-bang-is-loud-dumb-exhausting/20141002.htm |date=2 October 2014 |publisher=Rediff.com |accessdate=4 October 2014 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20141004042138/http://www.rediff.com/movies/review/review-bang-bang-is-loud-dumb-exhausting/20141002.htm |archivedate= 4 October 2014 |df= }} Although the film was commercially successful, financial analysts observed that it failed to meet box-office expectations.{{cite web|title=Mumbai 125KM And Sonali Cable Dull Bang Bang Is Semi Hit |url=http://www.boxofficeindia.com/Details/art_detail/mumbai125kmandsonalicabledullbangbangissemihit#.VEIIHfmUeSo |date=18 October 2014 |publisher=Box Office India |accessdate=18 October 2014 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20141021112147/http://boxofficeindia.com/Details/art_detail/mumbai125kmandsonalicabledullbangbangissemihit |archivedate=21 October 2014 |df= }} ''Ek Tha Tiger'', ''Dhoom 3'' and ''Bang Bang!'' still rank in the [[list of highest-grossing Indian films]], while ''Jab Tak Hai Jaan'' still rank in the [[list of highest-grossing Indian films in overseas markets]] === Career fluctuations and resurgence (2015–present) === [[File:Aditya, Katrina promot film ‘Fitoor’.jpg|thumb|left|Kaif with co-star [[Aditya Roy Kapur]] at an event for ''[[Fitoor]]'' in 2016]] Kaif's sole appearance of 2015 was with Saif Ali Khan in Kabir Khan's [[Aftermath of the 2008 Mumbai attacks|post 26/11]] [[counter-terrorism]] drama ''[[Phantom (2015 film)|Phantom]]''.{{cite web|title=After Phantom, Kabir Khan's Bajrangi Bhaijaan to kick start on November 3 |url=http://www.bollywoodhungama.com/news/2692973/After-Phantom%2C-Kabir-Khan%27s-Bajrangi-Bhaijaan-to-kick-start-on-November-3 |accessdate=1 November 2014 |publisher=Bollywood Hungama |date=1 November 2014 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20141103145619/http://www.bollywoodhungama.com/news/2692973/After-Phantom%2C-Kabir-Khan%27s-Bajrangi-Bhaijaan-to-kick-start-on-November-3 |archivedate= 3 November 2014 |df= }} In 2016, Kaif appeared in two films. In [[Abhishek Kapoor]]'s ''[[Fitoor]]'', an adaptation of [[Charles Dickens]]' ''[[Great Expectations]]'', Kaif played a role based on [[Estella (Great Expectations)|Estella Havisham]] along with [[Aditya Roy Kapur]] and [[Tabu (actress)|Tabu]].{{cite web|last=Prashar|first=Chandni|title=Katrina Kaif, Aditya Roy Kapur Fight Kashmir Chill With Fitoor Kiss|url=http://movies.ndtv.com/bollywood/katrina-kaif-aditya-roy-kapur-fight-kashmir-chill-with-fitoor-kiss-736871|publisher=NDTV|date=4 February 2015|accessdate=9 February 2015|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20150311032701/http://movies.ndtv.com/bollywood/katrina-kaif-aditya-roy-kapur-fight-kashmir-chill-with-fitoor-kiss-736871|archivedate=11 March 2015}} Later that year she featured in [[Nitya Mehra]]'s love story ''[[Baar Baar Dekho (film)|Baar Baar Dekho]]'' with [[Sidharth Malhotra]].{{cite news|title=Not 'Kal Jisne Dekha', Katrina Kaif-Sidharth Malhotra's film gets a new title |url=http://www.dnaindia.com/entertainment/report-not-kal-jisne-dekha-katrina-kaif-sidharth-malhotra-s-film-gets-a-new-title-2120899 |accessdate=27 September 2015 |work=Daily News and Analysis |date=1 September 2015 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20150928225206/http://www.dnaindia.com/entertainment/report-not-kal-jisne-dekha-katrina-kaif-sidharth-malhotra-s-film-gets-a-new-title-2120899 |archivedate=28 September 2015 |df= }} Both films were critical and commercial failures.{{cite news|last=Thakur |first=Charu |title=Baar Baar Dekho to Fitoor: 2016's glossy films which sank without a trace |url=http://indiatoday.intoday.in/story/baar-baar-dekho-sidharth-katrina-mohenjo-daro-fitoor-ki-and-ka-2016-flop-films/1/762438.html |accessdate=11 October 2016 |work=India Today |date=12 September 2016 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20161011230640/http://indiatoday.intoday.in/story/baar-baar-dekho-sidharth-katrina-mohenjo-daro-fitoor-ki-and-ka-2016-flop-films/1/762438.html |archivedate=11 October 2016 |df= }} In a review for the former, Namrata Joshi wrote: "Katrina is good so long as she has to just be herself. So she dances, smiles and flirts well, but the minute a dramatic scene comes up, her utter inadequacy as a performer shows."{{cite news|last=Joshi|first=Namrata|title=Fitoor doesn’t live up to expectations|url=http://www.thehindu.com/news/national/karnataka/fitoor-doesnt-live-up-to-expectations/article8235812.ece|accessdate=11 October 2016|work=The Hindu|date=14 February 2016}} Next year, Kaif appeared alongside Ranbir Kapoor in [[Anurag Basu]]'s comedy-adventure film ''[[Jagga Jasoos]]'', which was released in 2017 after multiple delays.{{cite web|title=Jagga Jasoos: Twists, turns and another release date|url=http://www.rediff.com/movies/report/jagga-jasoos-ranbir-kapoor-katrina-kaif-twists-turns-and-another-release-date/20170524.htm |accessdate=3 August 2017 |date=24 May 2017 |publisher=Rediff.com}} The film opened to mixed critical response and was a commercial disappointment.{{cite news|url=http://indianexpress.com/article/entertainment/bollywood/anurag-basu-on-jagga-jasoos-failure-4768232/|title=Anurag Basu on Jagga Jasoos failure: Rejection paves path for my next, promise won’t disappoint you|last=Kamleshwari|first=A.|work=The Indian Express|date=26 July 2017|accessdate=1 November 2017}} [[Mayank Shekhar]] from [[Mid Day]] said, “Honestly, I know no two faces as pleasant as [[Ranbir Kapoor]] and Katrina Kaif on the Indian screen. They naturally shine before the camera.” {{Cite news|url=https://www.mid-day.com/articles/jagga-jasoos-movie-review-film-rating-ranbir-kapoor-katrina-kaif-anurag-basu-bollywood-news/18423172|title=Jagga Jasoos Movie Review: Ranbir Kapoor and Katrina Kaif shine before camera|date=2017-07-14|work=mid-day|access-date=2018-04-30|language=en}} In the end of year, Kaif re-united with Salman Khan and reprised the role of Zoya in the Ali Abbas Zafar's action thriller film ''[[Tiger Zinda Hai]]'', sequel to the 2012 film ''Ek Tha Tiger.'' The film released on [[Christmas]] weekend and opened to strong box office collections, collecting over ₹1.1 billion within three days of release.{{cite news|url=http://indiatoday.intoday.in/story/tiger-zinda-hai-first-look-salman-khan-katrina-kaif/1/1070890.html|title=Tiger Zinda Hai first look: Salman Khan's brooding appearance makes for the perfect Diwali gift|last=Palat|first=Lakshana L|work=India Today|date=18 October 2017}} The film opened with positive to mixed reviews. Critics praised her action sequences but criticised her lack of dialogues. Rachit Gupta of ''[[Filmfare]]'' said, "The screenplay goes easy on [Kaif] by not giving her stand and dialogue. Instead, she does the bulk of the hand to hand combat and gun fights and she looks the part. It's invigorating to see a lady kick-ass with so much élan and pull all the punches like they're real."{{Cite news|url=https://www.filmfare.com/reviews/bollywood-movies/tiger-zinda-hai-movie-review-slick-and-smart-25773.html|title=Movie Review: Tiger Zinda Hai|work=Filmfare|access-date=2017-12-25|last=Gupta|first=Rachit}} As of August 2018, Kaif has filmed a supporting role in the [[Period film|period]] [[Action adventure film|action-adventure]] film ''[[Thugs of Hindostan]],'' marking her second collaboration with Aamir Khan, Amitabh Bachchan and director Vijay Krishna Acharya.{{Cite web|url=https://www.yashrajfilms.com/news/detail/2017/05/11/katrina-kaif-joins-yrf-star-studded-mega-project-thugs-of-hindostan|title=Katrina Kaif Joins YRF’s Star Studded Mega Project Thugs of Hindostan|website=www.yashrajfilms.com|access-date=2017-05-11}} Kaif has also filmed for the starring role of an alcoholic actress in [[Anand L Rai]]'s ''[[Zero (2018 film)|Zero]]'', marking her second collaboration with Shah Rukh Khan and Anushka Sharma.{{Cite news|url=http://www.ibtimes.co.in/confirmed-shah-rukh-khan-romance-alia-bhatt-katrina-kaif-not-deepika-padukone-aanand-l-rais-725915|title=Confirmed: Shah Rukh Khan to romance Alia Bhatt and Katrina Kaif, not Deepika Padukone, in Aanand L Rai's film|last=Sen|first=Sushmita|work=International Business Times, India Edition|access-date=2017-05-14|language=en}} Additionally, she has also committed to be cast in ''[[Bharat (film)|Bharat]]'' opposite her frequent co-star Salman Khan and director Ali Abbas Zafar, and also in the untitled dance film opposite [[Varun Dhawan]].{{Cite news |url=https://www.hindustantimes.com/bollywood/should-work-in-spaces-we-are-comfortable-in-says-katrina-kaif-on-being-a-glamourous-heroine/story-kz4bjYMRspdncBepP8RrXJ.html |title=Should work in spaces we are comfortable in, says Katrina Kaif on being a ‘glamourous heroine’ |last=Singh |first=Prashant |date=25 April 2018 |work=[[Hindustan Times]] |access-date=25 April 2018}} ==Off-screen work== [[File:Katrina Kaif at 18th Annual Colors Screen Awards 2012 (15).jpg|upright=1.0|alt=A medium shot of a woman dancing amid several other women. The woman in the centre is dressed in a black and silver outfit, while the women around her are dressed in pink and black clothing.|thumb|Katrina performing on Chikini Chameli at the 18th annual Colors Screen Awards, 2012]] Kaif is involved with Relief Projects India, a [[charitable trust]] run by her mother which rescues abandoned baby girls and works to prevent female [[infanticide]].{{cite news|last=Sinha |first=Seema |title=Touching lives |url=http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/people/Touching-lives/articleshow/7127277.cms |accessdate=8 June 2014 |work=The Times of India |date=23 January 2011 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20160215052740/http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/people/Touching-lives/articleshow/7127277.cms |archivedate=15 February 2016 |df= }} Kaif's winnings from the game shows ''[[10 Ka Dum]]'' and ''[[Kaun Banega Crorepati]]'' were donated to her mother's Mercy Home orphanage.{{cite news|last=Jha |first=Subhash K. |title=Katrina to appear on TV shows to fund mom's charity |url=http://www.mid-day.com/articles/katrina-to-appear-on-tv-shows-to-fund-moms-charity/61427 |accessdate=12 June 2014 |work=Mid Day |date=26 October 2009 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140714135115/http://www.mid-day.com/articles/katrina-to-appear-on-tv-shows-to-fund-moms-charity/61427 |archivedate=14 July 2014 |df= }} In 2009 and 2010, Kaif also walked the ramp for charity as part of Salman Khan's "Being Human" show.{{cite web|title=Bollywood actors walk ramp for charity in Mumbai |url=http://www.sify.com/movies/bollywood-actors-walk-ramp-for-charity-in-mumbai-news-bollywood-jkooudbaaecsi.html |publisher=Sify |date=14 October 2009 |accessdate=27 July 2014 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140729120118/http://www.sify.com/movies/bollywood-actors-walk-ramp-for-charity-in-mumbai-news-bollywood-jkooudbaaecsi.html |archivedate=29 July 2014 |df= }}{{cite news|title=Bollywood actresses walk on ramp to collect funds for Salman Khan's charity |url=http://www.dnaindia.com/lifestyle/report-bollywood-actresses-walk-on-ramp-to-collect-funds-for-salman-khans-charity-1450573 |accessdate=28 July 2014 |work=Daily News and Analysis |date=10 October 2010 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140808165639/http://www.dnaindia.com/lifestyle/report-bollywood-actresses-walk-on-ramp-to-collect-funds-for-salman-khans-charity-1450573 |archivedate= 8 August 2014 |df= }} To raise funds for a new school in [[Madurai]] she recorded ''[[Rhyme Skool with Katrina Kaif|Rhyme Skool]]'', an album of nursery rhymes composed by [[A. R. Rahman]].{{cite web|last=Astbury |first=Will |title=Katrina Kaif records charity album |url=http://www.digitalspy.com/bollywood/news/a216739/katrina-kaif-records-charity-album.html |publisher=[[Digital Spy]] |accessdate=8 June 2014 |date=27 April 2010 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20141226111615/http://www.digitalspy.com/bollywood/news/a216739/katrina-kaif-records-charity-album.html |archivedate=26 December 2014 |df= }}{{cite news |title=Katrina Kaif to sing for AR Rahman? |url=http://www.hindustantimes.com/entertainment/bollywood/katrina-kaif-to-sing-for-ar-rahman/article1-907000.aspx |accessdate=8 June 2014 |work=Hindustan Times |date=2 August 2012 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140714172448/http://www.hindustantimes.com/entertainment/bollywood/katrina-kaif-to-sing-for-ar-rahman/article1-907000.aspx |archivedate=14 July 2014 |df= }} In 2011, Kaif visited [[sepoy]]s in [[Jammu]] as part of [[NDTV]]'s reality program ''Jai Jawan''.{{cite web|title=PIX: Katrina Kaif visits jawans in Jammu |url=http://www.rediff.com/movies/slide-show/slide-show-1-katrina-kaif-stunts-with-army/20110812.htm |publisher=Rediff.com |accessdate=8 June 2014 |date=12 August 2011 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140714143301/http://www.rediff.com/movies/slide-show/slide-show-1-katrina-kaif-stunts-with-army/20110812.htm |archivedate=14 July 2014 |df= }} The following year she visited the Cancer Patients Aid Association to gift cancer survivors and increase public awareness of breast and cervical cancer.{{cite news|title=Katrina lends a hand to cancer cause |url=http://indiatoday.intoday.in/story/katrina-lends-a-pink-hand-to-cancer-cause/1/237197.html |accessdate=10 July 2014 |work=India Today |date=11 December 2012 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140714172702/http://indiatoday.intoday.in/story/katrina-lends-a-pink-hand-to-cancer-cause/1/237197.html |archivedate=14 July 2014 |df= }} Kaif has also performed onstage, participating in Shah Rukh Khan's "Temptations Reloaded" world concert tour in 2008. Also featuring [[Kareena Kapoor Khan|Kareena Kapoor]] and Arjun Rampal, the tour began in [[Amsterdam]] in June and ended four months later in [[Dubai]]'s Festival City Arena before an audience of 15,000.{{cite web|title=SRK's Temptations Reloaded 2008 kick starts! |url=http://specials.rediff.com/movies/2008/jun/27sld1.htm |publisher=Rediff.com |accessdate=12 October 2013 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20090410203435/http://specials.rediff.com/movies/2008/jun/27sld1.htm |archivedate=10 April 2009 |df= }}{{cite news|last=Radhakrishnan|first=Manjusha|title=Saturday night live with Shah Rukh Khan|url=http://gulfnews.com/about-gulf-news/al-nisr-portfolio/tabloid/articles/saturday-night-live-with-shah-rukh-khan-1.138718|accessdate=10 June 2014|work=[[Gulf News]]|date=26 October 2008}} Kaif rejoined Shah Rukh Khan for his 2013 "Temptations Reloaded" concert in [[Muscat, Oman|Muscat]], performing to an audience of over 18,000.{{cite video|date=19 February 2013 |title=Temptations Reloaded 2013: SRK, Katrina, Preity enthrall Muscat |url=http://ibnlive.in.com/videos/373885/temptations-reloaded-2013-srk-katrina-preity-enthrall-muscat.html |publisher=CNN-IBN |accessdate=10 June 2014 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140715210246/http://ibnlive.in.com/videos/373885/temptations-reloaded-2013-srk-katrina-preity-enthrall-muscat.html |archivedate=15 July 2014 |df= }} She performed with [[Akon]] at the closing ceremony of the [[2009 Indian Premier League]] at the [[Wanderers Stadium]] in [[Johannesburg]],{{cite web|url=http://www.sify.com/sports/katrina-akon-bring-curtains-down-on-ipl-2009-imagegallery-cricket-jfzjK9bdhgc.html |title=Katrina-Akon bring curtains down on IPL 2009 |publisher=Sify |accessdate=28 January 2013 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20131208034538/http://www.sify.com/sports/katrina-akon-bring-curtains-down-on-ipl-2009-imagegallery-cricket-jfzjK9bdhgc.html |archivedate= 8 December 2013 |df= }} and joined Shah Rukh Khan, [[Deepika Padukone]] and [[Pitbull (rapper)|Pitbull]] in [[Kolkata]] for the opening ceremony of the [[2013 Indian Premier League|2013 IPL season]].{{cite web|title=IPL 2013: Shah Rukh Khan, Katrina Kaif, Deepika Padukone, Pitbull showcase diverse culture|url=http://movies.ndtv.com/bollywood/ipl-2013-shah-rukh-khan-katrina-kaif-deepika-padukone-pitbull-showcase-diverse-culture-349474|publisher=NDTV|accessdate=10 June 2014|date=3 April 2013|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140713121133/http://movies.ndtv.com/bollywood/ipl-2013-shah-rukh-khan-katrina-kaif-deepika-padukone-pitbull-showcase-diverse-culture-349474|archivedate=13 July 2014}} In 2016, she joined other Indian celebrities for the "Dream Team Tour", where they performed in various American cities.{{cite news|last=Shekhar |first=Mimansa |title=Alia Bhatt, Katrina Kaif, Sidharth Malhotra’s Dream Team signs off with the ultimate booth photo, see pics |url=http://indianexpress.com/article/entertainment/bollywood/alia-bhatt-katrina-kaif-sidharth-malhotras-dream-team-signs-off-booth-photo-2991995/ |accessdate=11 October 2016 |date=26 August 2016 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20161011230840/http://indianexpress.com/article/entertainment/bollywood/alia-bhatt-katrina-kaif-sidharth-malhotras-dream-team-signs-off-booth-photo-2991995/ |archivedate=11 October 2016 |df= }} ==Personal life== [[File:Ranbir katrina kapoor christmas lunch.jpg|left|thumb|upright=1.1|right|alt=Ranbir Kapoor and Katrina Kaif pose together|Kaif and [[Ranbir Kapoor]] in 2015]] Kaif's personal life has been the subject of extensive media attention. She is reluctant to discuss her romantic life: "I have always believed that there is life before marriage and after marriage. Before marriage ... you are termed a single woman and I choose to conduct that part of my life with absolute dignity and discretion".{{cite news|last=Jamkhandikar |first=Shilpa |title='I don't want my kids to know how many boyfriends I had' |url=http://www.dnaindia.com/entertainment/report-i-dont-want-my-kids-to-know-how-many-boyfriends-i-had-1138453 |accessdate=25 June 2014 |work=Daily News and Analysis |date=11 December 2007 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140714203922/http://www.dnaindia.com/entertainment/report-i-dont-want-my-kids-to-know-how-many-boyfriends-i-had-1138453 |archivedate=14 July 2014 |df= }} Although rumours of a relationship with Salman Khan first emerged in 2003, it was not until after their 2010 breakup that Kaif spoke of the affair, calling it her first serious relationship.{{cite news|title=Salman was my first serious relationship: Katrina Kaif |url=http://www.hindustantimes.com/tabloid/salman-was-my-first-serious-relationship-katrina-kaif/story-AVsYMARO64Duw189Lbm98N.html |accessdate=6 December 2016 |work=Hindustan Times |date=7 December 2011 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20161220094600/http://www.hindustantimes.com/tabloid/salman-was-my-first-serious-relationship-katrina-kaif/story-AVsYMARO64Duw189Lbm98N.html |archivedate=20 December 2016 |df= }} They have remained friends, and the actress credits Khan with giving her confidence and guidance:{{cite news|last=Singh |first=Prashant |title=I am Katrina’s bodyguard: Salman Khan |url=http://www.hindustantimes.com/news-feed/archives/i-am-katrina-s-bodyguard-salman-khan/article1-734610.aspx |accessdate=10 July 2014 |work=Hindustan Times |date=19 August 2011 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140714122509/http://www.hindustantimes.com/news-feed/archives/i-am-katrina-s-bodyguard-salman-khan/article1-734610.aspx |archivedate=14 July 2014 |df= }}{{cite news|title=Salman believed in me: Katrina |url=http://indiatoday.intoday.in/story/Salman+believed+in+me:+Katrina/1/94790.html |accessdate=25 June 2014 |work=India Today |date=27 April 2010 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140714215118/http://indiatoday.intoday.in/story/Salman%20believed%20in%20me%3A%20Katrina/1/94790.html |archivedate=14 July 2014 |df= }}{{cite news|last=Choudhary |first=Anuradha |title="Salman's been a huge influence" – Katrina Kaif |url=http://www.filmfare.com/interviews/salmans-been-a-huge-influence-katrina-kaif-2787.html |accessdate=25 June 2014 |work=[[Filmfare]] |date=5 April 2013 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140811013355/http://www.filmfare.com/interviews/salmans-been-a-huge-influence-katrina-kaif-2787.html |archivedate=11 August 2014 |df= }} The reported reason for their breakup was Kaif's increasing closeness to Ranbir Kapoor during the filming of ''Ajab Prem Ki Ghazab Kahani''.{{cite news|title=Katrina Kaif nudges Deepika Padukone out of Ranbir Kapoor's tour |url=http://indiatoday.intoday.in/story/katrina-kaif-nudges-deepika-padukone-out-of-ranbir-kapoors-tour/1/122436.html |accessdate=25 June 2014 |work=India Today |date=8 December 2010 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20141021034700/http://indiatoday.intoday.in/story/katrina-kaif-nudges-deepika-padukone-out-of-ranbir-kapoors-tour/1/122436.html |archivedate=21 October 2014 |df= }} Although this was denied by Kaif and Kapoor, the nature of their relationship was scrutinised by the media because they were thought to be involved with others at the time.{{cite news|last=Mirani |first=Indu |title=I want to be loved: Katrina |url=http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news-interviews/i-want-to-be-loved-katrina/articleshow/5997720.cms |accessdate=25 June 2014 |work=The Times of India |date=2 June 2010 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20160215052806/http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news-interviews/i-want-to-be-loved-katrina/articleshow/5997720.cms |archivedate=15 February 2016 |df= }}{{cite news|last=Pradhan |first=Bharathi S. |title=Single Sallu’s a friendly ex |url=http://www.telegraphindia.com/1101114/jsp/7days/story_13174492.jsp |accessdate=25 June 2014 |work=The Telegraph |date=14 November 2010 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140714174001/http://www.telegraphindia.com/1101114/jsp/7days/story_13174492.jsp |archivedate=14 July 2014 |df= }} In August 2013, photographs of Kapoor and Kaif on holiday in [[Ibiza]] were leaked by ''[[Stardust (magazine)|Stardust]]''; the media interpreted this as confirmation of an affair.{{cite news|last=Shrivastava |first=Anshu |title=Bollywood's Hottest Couple: Finally, Is 'Kat' Out of Ranbir Kapoor's Bag? |url=http://www.ibtimes.com.au/bollywoods-hottest-couple-finally-kat-out-ranbir-kapoors-bag-1313842 |accessdate=25 June 2014 |work=International Business Times |date=1 August 2013 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20150527143053/http://www.ibtimes.com.au/bollywoods-hottest-couple-finally-kat-out-ranbir-kapoors-bag-1313842 |archivedate=27 May 2015 |df= }} After the appearance of the photos, Kaif published an open letter to the media saying that she was "upset, distressed and invaded" by the breach of privacy.{{cite news|title=An open letter to the media from Katrina Kaif |url=http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news-interviews/An-open-letter-to-the-media-from-Katrina-Kaif/articleshow/21528241.cms |accessdate=25 June 2014 |work=The Times of India |date=2 August 2013 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140423124426/http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news-interviews/An-open-letter-to-the-media-from-Katrina-Kaif/articleshow/21528241.cms |archivedate=23 April 2014 |df= }} She later acknowledged Kapoor as "an extremely important part of [her] life".{{cite news|last=KBR |first=Upala |title=Ranbir Kapoor is an important part of my life: Katrina Kaif |url=http://www.dnaindia.com/entertainment/interview-ranbir-kapoor-is-an-important-part-of-my-life-katrina-kaif-1936375 |accessdate=25 June 2014 |work=Daily News and Analysis |date=17 December 2013 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20141013013227/http://www.dnaindia.com/entertainment/interview-ranbir-kapoor-is-an-important-part-of-my-life-katrina-kaif-1936375 |archivedate=13 October 2014 |df= }} In February 2016, the media reported that they had broken up.{{cite news|title=Did the break-up with Ranbir Kapoor cost Katrina Kaif an endorsement deal? |url=http://www.dnaindia.com/entertainment/report-did-the-break-up-with-ranbir-kapoor-cost-katrina-kaif-an-endorsement-deal-2183398 |accessdate=11 October 2016 |work=Daily News and Analysis |date=28 February 2016 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20161027165511/http://www.dnaindia.com/entertainment/report-did-the-break-up-with-ranbir-kapoor-cost-katrina-kaif-an-endorsement-deal-2183398 |archivedate=27 October 2016 |df= }} Kaif has a close relationship with her family, and the lack of a father figure in her life has given her a sense of responsibility towards them.{{cite journal|last=Jahagirdar-Saxena |first=Shraddha |url=http://www.verveonline.com/121/people/katrina.shtml |title=View From The Top |journal=[[Verve (magazine)|Verve]] |volume=21 |issue=6 |accessdate=25 June 2014 |date=6 June 2013 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140714183415/http://www.verveonline.com/121/people/katrina.shtml |archivedate=14 July 2014 |df= }} While Kaif's mother is Christian and her father is Muslim, Kaif was brought up to practise all faiths and says she is a "firm believer in God".{{cite news|last=Gupta |first=Priya |title=Katrina Kaif: We have a mandir at our home |url=http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news/Katrina-Kaif-We-have-a-mandir-at-our-home/articleshow/46726227.cms |accessdate=29 March 2015 |work=The Times of India |date=29 March 2015 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20150329202651/http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news/Katrina-Kaif-We-have-a-mandir-at-our-home/articleshow/46726227.cms |archivedate=29 March 2015 |df= }}{{cite news|last=Bamzai |first=Kaveree |title=Golden girl Katrina Kaif |url=http://indiatoday.intoday.in/story/golden-girl-katrina-kaif/1/236145.html |accessdate=25 June 2014 |work=India Today |date=5 December 2012 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140714121906/http://indiatoday.intoday.in/story/golden-girl-katrina-kaif/1/236145.html |archivedate=14 July 2014 |df= }} ''The Times of India'' reported in 2009 that she visits [[Siddhivinayak Temple, Mumbai|Siddhivinayak Temple]], [[Mount Mary Church, Bandra|Mount Mary Church]], and the [[Sufism|Sufi]] shrine [[Ajmer Sharif Dargah]] before her films are released.{{cite news|title=Unplugged: Katrina Kaif |url=http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/people/Unplugged-Katrina-Kaif/articleshow/4791923.cms |accessdate=25 June 2014 |work=The Times of India |date=31 October 2009 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20160215052759/http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/people/Unplugged-Katrina-Kaif/articleshow/4791923.cms |archivedate=15 February 2016 |df= }} ==In the media== [[File:Katrina Kaif at an event for Nakshatra.jpg|thumb|upright=0.9|left|alt=A woman dressed in traditional Indian clothing is looking away from the camera. She has a red bindi between her eyebrows, a silver necklace and is wearing an embroidered red sari.|Kaif at an event for [[Nakshatra Jewellery]], 2010]] According to an ''[[India Today]]'' article, despite her dissimilarity to a conventional Bollywood heroine, Kaif "turned every adversity into opportunity and climbed the slippery pole of stardom". Although she is one of the most commercially successful actresses in contemporary Bollywood, she has received mixed reviews for her acting prowess.{{cite web|last=Vats |first=Rohit |title=Is Katrina Bollywood's lucky mascot? |url=http://ibnlive.in.com/news/is-katrina-bollywoods-lucky-mascot/183795-8-66.html |date=13 September 2011 |publisher=CNN-IBN |accessdate=21 October 2013 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20131205145526/http://ibnlive.in.com/news/is-katrina-bollywoods-lucky-mascot/183795-8-66.html |archivedate= 5 December 2013 |df= }} Writing for ''[[Firstpost]]'', Anuya Jakatdar wrote that Kaif needed to "take on role[s] that actually challenge her" instead of "coasting on her co-star’s box office appeal" and criticised her inclination towards glamorous roles.{{cite web|last=Jakatdar |first=Anuya |title=A career tip for birthday Barbie Katrina Kaif: Learn to act |url=http://www.firstpost.com/bollywood/a-career-tip-for-birthday-barbie-katrina-kaif-learn-to-act-959053.html |publisher=[[Firstpost]] |accessdate=26 June 2014 |date=16 July 2013 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20150924013452/http://www.firstpost.com/bollywood/a-career-tip-for-birthday-barbie-katrina-kaif-learn-to-act-959053.html |archivedate=24 September 2015 |df= }} Kaif's dancing ability is better appreciated, with Meena Iyer of ''The Times of India'' calling her "one of Bollywood's best dancers".{{cite news|last=Iyer |first=Meena |title=Why Katrina Kaif looks forward to dancing in films now |url=http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news-interviews/Why-Katrina-Kaif-looks-forward-to-dancing-in-films-now/articleshow/16264607.cms |accessdate=26 June 2014 |work=The Times of India |date=6 September 2012 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20160215052729/http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news-interviews/Why-Katrina-Kaif-looks-forward-to-dancing-in-films-now/articleshow/16264607.cms |archivedate=15 February 2016 |df= }} Kaif's Bollywood success has sparked an influx of foreign talent hoping to establish themselves in the industry. Kaif is cited in the media as one of India's most beautiful celebrities, and has ranked highly in polls choosing the most attractive Indian celebrities. Kaif was named the "World's Sexiest Woman" by ''[[FHM (India)|FHM India]]'' five times from 2008 to 2013,{{cite news|title=Katrina Kaif voted 'FHM's' sexiest woman |url=http://www.dnaindia.com/lifestyle/report-katrina-kaif-voted-fhms-sexiest-woman-1552317 |accessdate=10 July 2014 |work=Daily News and Analysis |date=7 June 2011 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140714181217/http://www.dnaindia.com/lifestyle/report-katrina-kaif-voted-fhms-sexiest-woman-1552317 |archivedate=14 July 2014 |df= }}{{cite news|last=KBR |first=Upala |title=Deepika Padukone displaces Katrina Kaif in FHM 100 Sexiest Women in the World 2014 |url=http://www.dnaindia.com/entertainment/report-deepika-padukone-displaces-katrina-kaif-in-fhm-100-sexiest-women-in-the-world-2014-1999264 |accessdate=10 July 2014 |work=Daily News and Analysis |date=3 July 2014 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140707022951/http://www.dnaindia.com/entertainment/report-deepika-padukone-displaces-katrina-kaif-in-fhm-100-sexiest-women-in-the-world-2014-1999264 |archivedate= 7 July 2014 |df= }} and appeared on ''[[Verve (magazine)|Verve]]''{{'}}s list of most powerful women in 2009 and 2010.{{cite journal|last=Pandey |first=Piyush |url=http://www.verveonline.com/86/people/powerwomen03.shtml |title=Verve's 50 Power Women 2010 |journal=[[Verve (magazine)|Verve]] |volume=18 |issue=6 |accessdate=27 October 2013 |date=June 2010 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20121219054922/http://www.verveonline.com/86/people/powerwomen03.shtml |archivedate=19 December 2012 |df= }}{{cite journal|url=http://www.verveonline.com/74/people/powerlist.shtml |title=Verve’s 50 Power Women 2009 |journal=Verve |volume=17 |issue=6 |accessdate=27 October 2013 |date=June 2009 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20130404092809/http://verveonline.com/74/people/powerlist.shtml |archivedate= 4 April 2013 |df= }} The UK magazine ''[[Eastern Eye]]'' called her the "Sexiest Asian Woman" from 2008 to 2010, and again in 2013.{{cite web|title=Katrina is world's sexiest Asian... again |url=http://www.emirates247.com/entertainment/2.526/katrina-is-world-s-sexiest-asian-again-2010-12-12-1.328304 |publisher=Emirates 24/7 |date=12 December 2010 |accessdate=27 October 2013 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20131029195005/http://www.emirates247.com/entertainment/2.526/katrina-is-world-s-sexiest-asian-again-2010-12-12-1.328304 |archivedate=29 October 2013 |df= }}{{cite news|last=Mukhopadhyay |first=Sounak |title=Katrina Kaif Declared as Sexiest Asian Woman in the World, Fourth Time for the British-Indian Actress |url=http://www.ibtimes.com.au/katrina-kaif-declared-sexiest-asian-woman-world-fourth-time-british-indian-actress-1325878 |work=International Business Times |accessdate=2 August 2015 |date=5 December 2013 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20150924032435/http://www.ibtimes.com.au/katrina-kaif-declared-sexiest-asian-woman-world-fourth-time-british-indian-actress-1325878 |archivedate=24 September 2015 |df= }} Kaif was named ''The Times of India''{{'}}s "Most Desirable Woman" in 2010, and was later ranked second from 2011 to 2013.{{cite news|url=http://articles.timesofindia.indiatimes.com/2013-04-29/news-interviews/38903243_1_entrant-desirable-women-desirable-men|title=Times top 50 Most Desirable Women of 2012|work=The Times of India|accessdate=27 October 2013|date=29 April 2013}}{{cite news|title=Deepika Padukone: 2013’s Most desirable woman |url=http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news-interviews/Deepika-Padukone-2013s-Most-desirable-woman/articleshow/35726757.cms? |accessdate=5 June 2014 |work=The Times of India |date=30 May 2013 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140531081711/http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news-interviews/Deepika-Padukone-2013s-Most-desirable-woman/articleshow/35726757.cms |archivedate=31 May 2014 |df= }} The Indian edition of ''[[People (magazine)|People]]'' described her as "India's Most Beautiful Woman" in 2011 and three years later she topped ''[[Maxim (India)|Maxim India]]''{{'}}s "Hot 100" poll.{{cite web|title=Katrina Kaif voted India's Most Beautiful Woman by People Magazine |url=http://ibnlive.in.com/photogallery/4037.html |date=27 May 2011 |publisher=CNN-IBN |accessdate=20 November 2013 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140202201827/http://ibnlive.in.com/photogallery/4037.html |archivedate= 2 February 2014 |df= }}{{cite news|title=Katrina Kaif edges past her contemporaries! |url=http://www.dnaindia.com/entertainment/report-katrina-kaif-edges-past-her-contemporaries-2062648 |accessdate=8 March 2015 |work=Daily News and Analysis |date=20 February 2015 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20150223034247/http://www.dnaindia.com/entertainment/report-katrina-kaif-edges-past-her-contemporaries-2062648 |archivedate=23 February 2015 |df= }} Kaif is a [[Brand ambassador|celebrity spokesperson]] for a number of brands including [[Slice (soft drink)|Slice]], [[Nakshatra Jewellery|Nakshatra]], [[Lux (soap)|Lux]], [[Panasonic]], [[Lakmé Cosmetics|Lakmé]] and [[L'Oréal]].{{cite news |last=Sharma |first=Neha |title=OVER THE YEARS: Decoding Kat’s nine lives! |url=http://www.hindustantimes.com/Entertainment/Bollywood/OVER-THE-YEARS-Decoding-Kat-s-nine-lives/Article1-933113.aspx |accessdate=22 September 2013 |work=Hindustan Times |date=20 September 2012 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20130929235300/http://www.hindustantimes.com/Entertainment/Bollywood/OVER-THE-YEARS-Decoding-Kat-s-nine-lives/Article1-933113.aspx |archivedate=29 September 2013 |df= }}{{cite news|title=Katrina Kaif is the new face of L'Oréal Paris |url=http://www.dnaindia.com/entertainment/report-katrina-kaif-is-the-new-face-of-l-or-al-paris-1954611 |accessdate=21 January 2014 |work=Daily News and Analysis |date=21 January 2014 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140220154151/http://www.dnaindia.com/entertainment/report-katrina-kaif-is-the-new-face-of-l-or-al-paris-1954611 |archivedate=20 February 2014 |df= }} ''The Economic Times'' ranked Kaif India's second most prominent endorser in 2012.{{cite news|title=A snapshot of the top 10 small screen endorsers |url=http://economictimes.indiatimes.com/slideshows/advertising-marketing/a-snapshot-of-the-top-10-small-screen-endorsers/2-katrina-kaif/slideshow/12078572.cms |accessdate=4 March 2014 |work=The Economic Times |date=29 February 2012 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140911062317/http://economictimes.indiatimes.com/slideshows/advertising-marketing/a-snapshot-of-the-top-10-small-screen-endorsers/2-katrina-kaif/slideshow/12078572.cms |archivedate=11 September 2014 |df= }} ''Hindustan Times'' reported in 2014 that she received {{INRConvert|50|m}} to {{INRConvert|60|m}} for each endorsement, making her one of India's highest-paid celebrity endorsers.{{cite news|url=http://photogallery.indiatimes.com/celebs/celeb-themes/bwoods-highest-paid-actresses/articleshow/11005681.cms |title=B'wood's highest paid actresses |accessdate=23 October 2013 |work=The Times of India |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20131024035458/http://photogallery.indiatimes.com/celebs/celeb-themes/bwoods-highest-paid-actresses/articleshow/11005681.cms |archivedate=24 October 2013 |df= }}{{cite news|last=Shalvi|first=Mangaokar|title=Deepika Padukone pockets Rs. 6 crore for endorsement deal?|url=http://www.hindustantimes.com/entertainment/bollywood/deepika-gets-rs-6-crore-for-endorsing-a-cola/article1-1190666.aspx|accessdate=4 March 2014|work=Hindustan Times|date=4 March 2014|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140304190528/http://www.hindustantimes.com/entertainment/bollywood/deepika-gets-rs-6-crore-for-endorsing-a-cola/article1-1190666.aspx|archivedate=4 March 2014 }} In 2013, Kaif was ranked ninth on ''[[Forbes (India)|Forbes]]''{{'}} list of India's best-known entertainers with an estimated annual income of {{INRConvert|637.5|m}}.{{cite news|title=2013 Celebrity 100 List — Forbes India |url=http://forbesindia.com/lists/2013-celebrity-100/1439/all |work=[[Forbes (India)|Forbes]] |accessdate=8 February 2014 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140219072752/http://forbesindia.com/lists/2013-celebrity-100/1439/all |archivedate=19 February 2014 |df= }} In 2010 and 2011, [[Mattel]] released two sets of [[Barbie|Barbie dolls]] inspired by Kaif.{{cite web|title=Check Out: Katrina Kaif unveils special Barbie doll created in her likeness |url=http://www.bollywoodhungama.com/celebrities/features/type/view/id/1608/ |publisher=Bollywood Hungama |accessdate=28 March 2015 |date=23 November 2010 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20150402104845/http://www.bollywoodhungama.com/celebrities/features/type/view/id/1608/ |archivedate= 2 April 2015 |df= }}{{cite web|title=Katrina Kaif unveils 'I Can Be a Movie Star' Barbie doll |url=http://www.bollywoodhungama.com/celebrities/features/type/view/id/2156/ |publisher=Bollywood Hungama |accessdate=28 March 2015 |date=5 May 2011 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20150402091202/http://www.bollywoodhungama.com/celebrities/features/type/view/id/2156/ |archivedate= 2 April 2015 |df= }} In 2015, Kaif became the eighth Bollywood actor to have a wax figure installed at [[Madame Tussauds]] in London.{{cite news|title=Madame Tussauds to celebrate 15 years of Bollywood by unveiling Katrina Kaif wax statue |url=http://www.mid-day.com/articles/madame-tussauds-to-celebrate-15-years-of-bollywood-by-unveiling-katrina-kaif-wax-statue/16094151 |accessdate=18 November 2016 |work=Mid Day |date=26 March 2015 |deadurl=no |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20161118165423/http://www.mid-day.com/articles/madame-tussauds-to-celebrate-15-years-of-bollywood-by-unveiling-katrina-kaif-wax-statue/16094151
